titleStmt.title: A sermon preach'd at the funeral of the Honourable Col. Francis Collingwood, and of his lady who were both interr'd in St. John's Church, in the island of Nevis in America, May the 29th and May the 31st, 1699 / by Tho. Heskith ...
titleStmt.author: Heskith, Thomas.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
